Package uk.ac.cf.cs.scm5mjw.mda.mobility

Class Summary
MapNode This is a class which represents a node on a map.
MobilityMap This is a class which represents a map.
NodeLink This class is for representing a link to a map node.
 

Exception Summary
InvalidLinkException An exception for use when a link between MapNodes is not valid.
InvalidNodeException An exception for use when a node is found to be invalid (such as adding multiple nodes which have the same coordinates to a map).
